name: Recipe: Rice Pudding
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Rice Pudding.

value.name: Bird Egg
value.desc: An incredibly versatile ingredient that can supply all of your daily protein needs.

value.name: Rice
value.desc: A grain crop commonly found in Teyvat. People of all walks of life enjoy its distinct grainy texture. As the saying goes, "The same kind of rice can feed one hundred kinds of people."

value.name: Milk
value.desc: Sweet and fragrant cow's milk. Don't waste a single drop, not even that one rolling down your chin.

value.name: Sugar
value.desc: A seasoning derived from Sweet Flowers. Has the power to give both energy and happiness.

value.name: Rice Pudding
value.desc: A dessert made from rice. After cooking the rice beforehand, it is placed into a pot together with the other ingredients, stirred evenly, and steamed. The mouthfeel is fragrant and soft, a perfect denouement to any meal.

value.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Obtained from the Event Quest "Contraption-Contrived Cooking Course Part II" (Only Available during Moonlight Merriment Event in Version 2.1)</color>
